author: Max Poprawe
name: codebeamer-miro

scripts.prebuild-linux: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/img && cp -r src/img dist && cp src/index.html dist && cp src/pages/settings/settings.html dist && cp src/pages/picker/picker.html dist && mkdir dist/styles && cp -r src/styles dist
scripts.prebuild: (IF exist dist ( RD /s /q dist ) ELSE ( print 'a' )) && MKDIR dist\img && COPY src\img dist\img && COPY src\index.html dist && COPY src\pages\settings\settings.html dist && COPY src\pages\picker\picker.html dist && MKDIR dist\styles && COPY src\pages\picker\picker.css dist\styles && COPY src\pages\settings\settings.css dist\styles

description: This is a codeBeamer <-> Miro integration web-plugin to be installed on Miro. It allows to import codeBeamer items to a Miro board, displaying any associations between the items.
